title: El Malpais National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery              Photo Gallery                    Sandstone Bluffs Overlook   10 Photos  An ever-changing view of lava flows, sculpted sandstone cliffs, and vast mountain ridges.          Exploring the Lava Falls Area   7 Photos  Explore this incredible, other-worldly lava landscape over a short but sometimes challenging wilderness loop trail.          Hiking the Zuni-Acoma Trail   10 Photos  9 miles one way, this ancient crossing of the lava flows is as rewarding as it is challenging.            Caves and Trails in the Big Tubes Area   7 Photos  Explore two spectacular caves in this remote region of El Malpais. Lava bridges and other rugged features add to the surreal nature of this amazing place.
